channel.title: Jamal Afridi - Digital Product Developer
channel.description: Jamal Afridi is a digital product developer at MortgageHippo.com focused on product management, design, and Ruby on Rails development. Jamal is based in Chicago, IL.

item.title: Work-Life feature in the Chicago Tribune
item.description: I was recently featured in the Chicago Tribune’s Blue Sky Innovation where I discussed balancing work as a product developer at MortgageHippo with fasting during Ramadan. I’m happy to have contributed to such a great piece, even if it meant including an awkward photo of me eating a chip.

item.title: MortgageHippo is here!
item.description:
New name, new site, even better home financing experience. We’re happy to announce that Hippoteq is now MortgageHippo!

What is MortgageHippo? Think of MortgageHippo as a homebuyer’s personal guide. We walk you through every step of the mortgage transaction and empower you with the necessary tools to make smarter decisions.

Proud of the team for their work in getting everything prepped for the switch to MortgageHippo.com. Let us know what you think!
